subject: New York City Marathon
Prices (Fares, Fees and Rates)
Marathon Running
Police
lead_paragraph: Organizers of the New York City Marathon and dozens of other races that use city streets say that a new fee sought by the police could significantly drive up their costs.
snippet: Organizers of the New York City Marathon and dozens of other races that use city streets say that a new fee sought by the police could significantly drive up their costs.
